title: The mechanism of NOx removal in the sintering process based on source reduction of carbon emissions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11007-11016
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01102C, Paper

Shiwang Han, Ranlei Shao, Luyuan Wang, Xingyu Zhang, Chengbo Xuan, Xingxing Cheng, Zhiqiang Wang
In this study, poplar carbon is used as auxiliary fuel to replace part of the coke powder used in the sintering process of iron ore to reduce emissions.
